short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a posts and track the replys

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension works for all Discuz forum such as Uwants and HKDiscuss
Steps to use
1. at your current posts, click the extension icon(right top)
2. click add
3. if new reply is detected then it will have a notification popup at left right corner

(Only 4 posts can be subscribed in free version)
